verses.roman:
jāla khasāite tāra aṅga-sparśa ha-ila
sparśa-mātre sei bhūta hṛdaye paśila

synonyms: jāla—the net; khasāite—releasing; tāra—his; aṅga-sparśa—touch of the body; ha-ila—there was; sparśa-mātre—as soon as I touched it; sei—that; bhūta—ghost; hṛdaye—in my heart; paśila—entered.
translation: "As I tried to release the net, I touched the body, and as soon as I touched it, a ghost entered my heart.
